div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 275 Athens (Plaka), c. 1942 Burial: c. 140-130 B.C. (T); c. 87 (Price) Contents: 85 AE. Pot hoard Athens: 1 3rd cent. (as Svoronos pl. 24, 42) 80 New Style (as Sv. pl. 22, 53-8 [15]; pl. 81 [41]; pl. 24, 62 ff. [24]) 4 "Delian" type (as Sv. pl. 107, 50 ff.) Disposition: Evelpidis coll., Athens Thompson, Athens, pp. 526 ff. Price, NC 1964, pp. 27-36
